title: Luce Center Scavenger Hunts
welcome: Welcome to Scavenger Hunts at the Smithsonian American Art Museum

hunts.title: Women's History Month Scavenger Hunt
hunts.description: Explore famous women in our collection!
hunts.welcome: Follow the clues around the Luce Foundation Center to find these pieces by female artists. Answer the questions and bring your completed hunt back to the Luce Center info desk to claim your prize!

Luce Foundation Center, Folk Art section

hunts.title: Bear Scavenger Hunt
hunts.description: Bears, OH MY! Explore bears in our collection.
hunts.welcome: Find the bears before they go into hibernation!
